EmailTemplate.name: SM-2018-10-23-Community Survey.Completed Survey Thank You - Yes to Meeting
EmailTemplate.subject: Your reward for completing Turbonomic's 2018 Community Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for completing our 2018 Community Survey, your feedback is greatly appreciated! As a reward for your time, here's your $10.00 Amazon.com gift card. Please follow the link below to claim this offer.
In your survey, you indicated that you'd like to meet with a Turbonomic engineer for a customized demonstration to learn how workload automation can help you optimize performance, cost, and compliance on-prem and in the cloud.
A Turbonomic representative will be reaching out to you shortly to schedule this time to chat. When your meeting completes, you will receive an additional $50 gift card.
{{my.10 Amazon Rybbon Gift:default=edit me}}
Regards, Megan
